hero.title: Bulgarian Additive Manufacturing Association
hero.subtitle: Uniting Innovation. Empowering Industry. Shaping the Future.
about.title: About Us
about.description: The Bulgarian Additive Manufacturing Association (BAMAS) was established to address the pressing need for structured collaboration within Bulgaria's growing 3D printing ecosystem. As the industry evolves rapidly, we provide a neutral, non-commercial platform that fosters innovation and strategic growth.
about.subtitle: Our focus is on the future of Industry 4.0 in Bulgaria, bringing together manufacturers, researchers, educational institutions, and technology innovators to create a thriving environment for additive manufacturing excellence.
mission.vision.title: Our Vision
mission.vision.description: To unify and amplify the Bulgarian additive manufacturing sector's capabilities in the global arena, establishing Bulgaria as a recognized center of excellence for 3D printing innovation and implementation.
mission.mission.title: Our Mission
mission.mission.subtitle: Our mission is the path to an innovative future
mission.mission.item1: Facilitate collaboration between companies, researchers, and institutions
mission.mission.item2: Advocate for technological progress and regulatory support
mission.mission.item3: Promote innovation and excellence in 3D manufacturing
mission.mission.item4: Build international partnerships to bring global best practices to Bulgaria
objectives.title: Core Objectives
objectives.item1.title: Strengthen Communication
objectives.item1.description: Foster dialogue and knowledge sharing between 3D printing companies across Bulgaria.
objectives.item2.title: Support Startups
objectives.item2.description: Provide visibility, mentorship and guidance to emerging additive manufacturing ventures.
objectives.item3.title: Promote Open Innovation
objectives.item3.description: Create joint ventures with AI, aerospace, automotive, medical, and educational sectors.
objectives.item4.title: Stimulate Market Development
objectives.item4.description: Drive growth through strategic events, policy dialogue and international partnerships.

membership.pricing.subtitle: Choose the membership tier that fits your needs

membership.pricing.foreign.title: Foreign Company
membership.title: Member Benefits
membership.benefits.item1.title: Industry Insights
membership.benefits.item1.description: Access to exclusive reports, market analysis, and additive manufacturing trends.
membership.benefits.item2.title: Networking Opportunities
membership.benefits.item2.description: Connect with peers, institutions, and potential clients or partners.
membership.benefits.item3.title: Priority Event Access
membership.benefits.item3.description: Get early registration and special rates for BAMAS-hosted conferences and workshops.
membership.benefits.item4.title: EU Project Participation
membership.benefits.item4.description: Eligibility to join BAMAS-coordinated EU-funded consortiums and projects.
membership.benefits.item5.title: Marketing Exposure
membership.benefits.item5.description: Shared promotional opportunities through BAMAS's platforms and media partnerships.
membership.benefits.item6.title: Industry Voice
membership.benefits.item6.description: Represent the sector's interests in policy discussions and regulatory frameworks.
events.title: Events Timeline
events.past.title: Past Events
events.upcoming.title: Upcoming Events
events.conference.title: Founding Conference of BAMAS
events.conference.register.title: Register for the Conference
events.conference.register.description: Join us at the founding conference of BAMAS to connect with industry leaders and discover the future of additive manufacturing in Bulgaria.
events.planning2026.title: 2026 First Planning Meeting
events.planning2026.description: Join us for the first planning meeting of 2026 to discuss strategic initiatives, upcoming projects, and collaboration opportunities for the year ahead.
partner.title: Partner With Us
partner.description1: BAMAS invites companies, universities, research institutions, and organizations involved in additive manufacturing to join our network. Together, we can accelerate innovation, share knowledge, and strengthen Bulgaria's position in the global 3D printing landscape.
partner.description2: Our partners benefit from collaborative opportunities, shared resources, access to specialized expertise, and a wider platform for visibility and impact.
partner.interest.title: Express Your Interest
partner.interest.description: Ready to join forces with BAMAS? Click the button below to fill out our partnership application form.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.form.title: Send a Message
contact.form.description: Have questions about BAMAS or interested in learning more about our initiatives? Click the button below to send us a message through our contact form.
contact.discord.title: Chat with Us
contact.discord.description: Want to connect with our team? Join our Discord server to chat with us and get your questions answered in real-time.

footer.newsletter.description: Join our newsletter for the latest updates and exclusive offers.
